text:
Human Resource and Development Minister Smriti Irani on Sunday accused the Congress vice-president Rahul Gandhi of cheating the people of his Lok Sabha constituency.

“Rahul has not fulfilled his responsibility towards his extended family. What can a country expect of a person who does not fulfil his responsibility towards his family,” Ms. Irani told reporters here. The minister also questioned the development work carried out by Mr. Gandhi in his constituency. — PTI
title: Smriti questions development work done by Rahul
